span.span: The type of the tuple's only component.

summary.span: 表示 1 元组，或单元组。

span.span: Represents a 1-tuple, or singleton.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示1元组，即单一实例，它是具有单个组件的元组。The class represents a 1-tuple, or singleton, which is a tuple that has a single component. 在应用程序开发中，单一实例相对很少使用。A singleton is used comparatively rarely in application development. 可以 通过调用 构造函数或静态方法来实例化对象 。You can instantiate a object by calling either the constructor or the static method. 您可以使用只读实例属性检索元组的单个组件的值 。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's single component by using the read-only instance property.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`在下列条件下，参数被视为等于当前实例：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是一个 对象。It is a object. - 其单个组件的类型与当前实例相同。Its single component is of the same type as the current instance. - 它的单个组件等于当前实例的组件。Its single component is equal to that of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例调用 方法来比较对象， 其组件为 具有三个对象（ 其组件具有以下特征）的值：The following example calls the method to compare a object whose component is a value with three objects whose components have the following characteristics: - 同一类型 () 和相同的值。Same type () and same value. - ) (相同 的类型，但值不同。Same type (), but different value. - 不同类型 () ，但值相同。Different type (), but same value. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 通过以下两种方式之一确定组件的类型：You can determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过 `GetType` 对属性返回的值调用方法 。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索 表示对象的对象 ，并从该数组中检索由其方法返回的第一个元素 。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. 该示例演示了这两种方法。The example illustrates both approaches. ## Examples 下面的示例显示有关两个单一实例及其组件的信息。The following example displays information about two singletons and their components. summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.
Value
Description
A negative integer
This instance precedes .
Zero

description.span: 此实例在排序顺序中的位置与 相同。

span.span: This instance and have the same position in the sort order.
A positive integer
This instance follows .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 尽管可以直接调用此方法，但它最常见的方法是包含参数的集合排序方法， 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，它由 方法和 使用构造函数实例化的对象的方法调用 。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义了一个名为 `DescendingComparer` 的泛型类，该类实现 接口。The following example defines a generic class named `DescendingComparer` that implements the interface. `DescendingComparer` 通过反转特定类型的默认比较器返回的值，对对象进行降序排序，而不是按升序排序。`DescendingComparer` sorts objects in descending rather than ascending order by reversing the value returned by the default comparer for a particular type. 然后，将泛型类的实例 `DescendingComparer` 传递给 方法，以便按降序对对象数组进行排序 。An instance of the generic `DescendingComparer` class is then passed to the method to sort an array of objects in descending order. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由 方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`1.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.compareto/cs/compareto2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`1.CompareTo#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.compareto/vb/compareto2.vb#2)]

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当不为时，才会调用实现 `other` `null` ，并且如果可以成功地强制转换 c # 中的 () 或将) Visual Basic 中的 (转换为 其单个组件的类型与当前实例相同的对象。The implementation is called only if `other` is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose single component is of the same type as the current instance. 方法传递 当前实例的组件和 由参数表示的对象的组件 `other` 。The method is passed the component of the current instance and the component of the object represented by the `other` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个 实现，该实现在两个浮点值大致相等时将其视为相等 (也就是说，如果一个值在另一个) 的 .01% 范围内。The following example defines an implementation that considers two floating-point values to be equal if they are approximately equal to each other (that is, if one value is within .01 percent of the other). [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`1.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`1.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`1.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 方法只是包装对 `comparer` 对象实现的调用 。The method simply wraps a call to the `comparer` object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应为被视为相等的两个对象返回相同的哈希代码 。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口成员的实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例被强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供 类的实现 。This method provides the implementation for the class. 尽管可以直接调用方法，但它通常由集合排序方法（如和）的默认重载调用， 以对集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法旨在用于排序操作。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 如果比较的主要目的是确定两个对象是否相等，则不应使用此方法。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象是否相等，请调用 方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 方法使用默认的对象比较器。The method uses the default object comparer. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个单一实例数组，其组件为 值。The following example creates an array of singletons whose component is a value. 它以未排序的顺序显示每个元组组件的值，对数组进行排序，然后按排序顺序显示这些值。It displays the value of each tuple component in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then displays the values in sorted order. 请注意，该示例不会直接调用 方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 此方法由 方法为数组中的每个元素隐式调用。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array.
